articles.author: Kyle Orland
articles.title: Donkey Kong Bananza is a worthy successor to Super Mario Odyssey’s legacy - Ars Technica
articles.description: Cathartic, punch-fueled land destruction is a great showcase for Switch 2 hardware.

articles.title: Foldable iPhone’s Preliminary Specifications Shared By Analysts Include The Advanced 2nm A20 Pro, & New C2 5G Modem, But Camera Hardware Could Miss Out On Telephoto Unit To Reduce Cost - Wccftech
articles.description: The estimated specifications of Apple’s foldable iPhone has been shared by analysts, mentioning an advanced SoC and 5G modem
articles.content: The internal specifications surrounding the foldable iPhone share some polarity. On one hand, Apples most cutting-edge smartphone will be loaded with top-end hardware, but the company is also reporte… [+2649 chars]
